abstract.title: Warning
abstract.para: The GT4 release includes the pre-WS version of GRAM (referred to as GRAM2), for legacy purposes only - it will be deprecated at some future time as experience is gained with the WS implementation. Please use the existing documentation for GRAM2: here

row.entry: The following guides are available for this component:

emphasis.olink: Using Scheduler Event Generator with GRAM2

row.entry: Describes using the Scheduler Event Generator (SEG) for obtaining job state information from the scheduler log files in place of running a poll command periodically.
